1_1EJ2NwsYY3dEVgB7XM1HXdBNgEHP1zy9Ek.body:
Hello from Mexico, this is the best place you can start publishing something without being censored, yet it does not make you invulnerable to be identified, try opening ZeroNet with Tor. and not using your real information. any infomation you post here will never be taken down, unless you do it.

As for bitcoin market, I see it hard, you need serious hardware for that, and I doubt you can afford it, even more considering the financial situation of Venezuela. The hardware is sold in dollars or equivalent, and many of it is already hard to find in countries like Mexico. Not to mention the electricity bills.

Best you can do is try to get out of Venezuela, it will pay more for your future than trying to mine bitcoins.

If you already have hardware at your disposal. like nice laptop or computer, then I suggest you research how to start mining. and you might gain 5 dollars in the first month. (that, by Venezuela standards is a lot), but every time it will get harder.,

> [saitor](#comment_5_1EJ2NwsYY3dEVgB7XM1HXdBNgEHP1zy9Ek): ok im understand, and what is the value approximate of one hardware for this? i understand that this is very highest the Price, no other options more economic? here de sallary is 15-25$ max in 1 month  and this no reach for nothing here now.

One motherboard, least 80 dollars. 1 cpu least 150 dls, ram least 50 dollars, power supply least 120 dollars, keyboard 20 dollars, mouse, 20 dollars, screen, 100 dollars, GPU least 200 dollars. 

there are already dedicated Bitcoin mining hardware that might come cheaper or not. but I don't know if you can find it.

Prices are cheap aprox.

> [saitor](#comment_6_1EJ2NwsYY3dEVgB7XM1HXdBNgEHP1zy9Ek): xDD 2 years of work jajaja. and what is requerimentsof the cpu? i think that use i5 minimun or its posible use hardware with less potency?

maybe a  the fastest i3. or even the best pentium if you buy a Z270  motherboard. esta jodido el asunto. LOL.

> [saitor](#comment_7_1EJ2NwsYY3dEVgB7XM1HXdBNgEHP1zy9Ek): My pc is i3 with 8 gb ram but the car graphic is bad, is a geforce 210. xD si bastante jodida la vaina xD jaja

Te conviene mejor tratar de crear un sitio en internet donde vendas publicidad, hazte youtuber, o inventate haz peliculas indie con you celular o camara.

Si decides minar con esas especificaciones, quizas llegues a 6 dolares el primer mes, el segundo mes 3 el tercero y asi cada vez mas dificil. pero igual lo ganas constante. y te sirve de algo.
